refsect1.title: Unit directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring units, used in unit files.

refsect1.title: Options on the kernel command line
refsect1.para: Kernel boot options for configuring the behaviour of the systemd process.

refsect1.title: Environment variables
refsect1.para: Environment variables understood by the systemd manager and other programs.

refsect1.title: UDEV directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring systemd units through the udev database.

refsect1.title: Journal fields
refsect1.para: Fields in the journal events with a well known meaning.

refsect1.title: crypttab options
refsect1.para: Options which influence mounted filesystems and encrypted volumes.

refsect1.title: System manager directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring the behaviour of the systemd process.

refsect1.title: bootchart.conf directives
refsect1.para: Directives for configuring the behaviour of the systemd-bootchart process.

refsect1.title: command-line options
refsect1.para: Command-line options accepted by programs in the systemd suite.
